title: Parcel Pending Package Lockers, Virtual Guest Parking, Bike Racks
posting_body: Welcome to Bell South Bay in Inglewood, CA!
Come home to Bell South Bay, where Life Takes Flight!
This luxury community is located just five minutes from the Pacific Ocean and ten minutes away from SOFI Stadium.

Situated at the door step of El Segundo Aviation Green Line Metrorail Station and at the intersection of the 405 and 105 Freeways, Bell South Bay’s transit-oriented, “Silicon Beach” location and modern coastal living makes it such a west coast charm.
Bell South Bay’s location is desirable to some of the most prominent employers such as SpaceX, Microsoft, Amazon, Boeing, Mattel, Herbalife and Novartis.

As part of the Wiseburn School District, residents of Bell South Bay have access to some of the region’s highest-performing schools Da Vinci Innovation Academy, Da Vinci Science and Richard Henry Dana Middle School, all which are located within two miles of the property.
Controlled Access Community
Porcelain Tile Flooring, Polished Quartz Vanities, and Framed Mirrors
Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances Including Built-in Microwave
Lighted Ceiling Fans in Living Room and Master Suite
Space Saving Stackable In-home Washer and Dryer
Wood Look Plank Flooring in the Living Spaces
Gated Multi-Level Parking Garage with Elevators
Two Outdoor Courtyard with Stainless Steel BBQs and Outdoor Fireplace or Fire Table
24-Hour Fitness Center Featuring Resort Quality Technogym Training Equipment
Walk-in Closet with Built-in Shelving
Bike Racks
Alpha Finish Package-Makassaro vertical grain cabinets
